name: Berserker (PlantOnMyPing)
description:
This is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme was  Out of Control.

The game portrays a cityscape where the player with ability to camouflage himself when he is in NORMAL mode. But when he is angered, he goes into BERSERK mode and goes on a rampage, harming others and himself in the process.  He absolutely loses control.

This game sends a message that anger may make you stronger but it also consumes you.

Abilities:

  1. Camouflage in normal mode (in front of stores ans alley ways).
  2. Sword attack in berserk mode,
  3. Sonic boom in berserk mode.

Notes:

  • Player loses health constantly in berserk mode.
  • The aim is to kill as many demons before the timer or health runs out.
